challenges: When hosting a work meeting, common challenges include keeping participants focused, managing time effectively, and encouraging balanced participation. Some attendees may dominate the conversation while others remain quiet, making it difficult to hear all perspectives. Technical issues or late arrivals can disrupt the flow and reduce productivity. Staying on topic is also challenging, especially when discussions drift away from the agenda. Finally, ensuring clear outcomes—such as decisions, action items, and next steps—can be difficult if the meeting lacks structure or runs out of time.
